final int MASK_NONE = 0 [static, inherited]
 

A bit-mask (list) of built-in discovery plugins.

The bit-mask is an efficient and compact representation of a fixed-length list of com.rti.dds.infrastructure.DiscoveryConfigBuiltinPluginKind values.

QoS:
com.rti.dds.infrastructure.DiscoveryConfigQosPolicy
.MASK_NONE

final int MASK_ALL = 0xefff [static, inherited]
 

A bit-mask (list) of built-in discovery plugins.

The bit-mask is an efficient and compact representation of a fixed-length list of com.rti.dds.infrastructure.DiscoveryConfigBuiltinPluginKind values.
